message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
I think we can both do better than 50/50. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the bigger share as I'm the one making the proposal this round.
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I'm not giving in to your last offer.  Let's split it 45/55. This way we both get a little more than we would have in the previous round.
